physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient's triglyceride levels ranged from 700 to 4000 mg/dL with a maximum of 7112 mg/dL. Plasma apoC-II was below the detectable limit of 1 mg/dL.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The triglyceride levels were consistently high despite fat restriction and lipid-lowering medications.
